general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs and aspects related to the School of Dental Sciences and the School of Medical Sciences & Research at Sharda University for the 2025-26 academic year. It includes details on examinations, academic credit systems, curriculum feedback, university brochures, leadership, history, statutory bodies, and various skill enhancement initiatives such as language, soft skills, and entrepreneurship. Additionally, it mentions FM radio, visa and insurance guidelines, observership programs, and a mentoring portal.

programs.program_name: Master of Science in Computer Science
programs.eligibility_criteria: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field with a minimum GPA of 3.0. GRE scores are required.
required_documents: Official transcripts from all previous institutions
English proficiency test scores (TOEFL/IELTS) for international applicants

programs.program_name: Bachelor of Arts in English Literature
programs.eligibility_criteria: High school diploma or equivalent. Minimum GPA of 2.8 in high school.

career_path.summary: This text outlines potential career paths in engineering and provides a list of miscellaneous topics, including recruiter information, COVID-19 updates, details about Sharda University campuses in Uzbekistan and Agra, courses on human values and professional ethics, the National Cyber Crime Reporting Portal, and an International Credit Transfer Programme.
